name: Twitter Flat Dark & Clean
description:
Flat Dark & Clean skin for Twitter and tweetdeck.
Features:
Hides "You might have missed" from the feed.
Hides "Who to follow" from the feed.

user.name: Martinius Ulberg
user.about: Having a great time making theese skins. Taught myself CSS in January so the codes are prolly still a bit flimsy but I am getting there. Feel free to use any of my code for remixes! As I get better I also get more organized and work hard to make my code easy to understand and modify.

additional_info:
!!Notice!!
Massive changes have been made to Twitter and broken everything. Skin will likely have to be made from ground up. Don't expect this to happen anytime soon in this heat. 
Have a good summer and remember that twitter have two of their very own dark skins now :)

v.1.5
Fixes for mobile.twitter.
v.1.4
Fixes for twitter update. Fixes for mobile.twitter.
v.1.3
Added support for mobile.twitter.com
v.1.2
Minor fixes
v.1.1
Live video fix
v.1.0
Skin seams good. Moving it out of beta.
v.0.5
Added tweetdeck support.
v.0.4
Added support for customization.
v.0.3
Rebuilt from the ground. Feed now blends with the background with each tweet having a thin separator rather then their own window.

discussions.name: This is what twitter should look like!
not quite working right where twitter's new thread system is used
